channel.title: Digital.gov Communities of Practice on Digital.gov
channel.description: Recent content in Digital.gov Communities of Practice on Digital.gov

item.title: Join the Contact Center
item.description: Explore methods of service delivery that improve customer experience in government contact centers.

item.title: Records management
item.description: These communities of interest are for federal staff seeking to improve records management across the government.

item.title: Federal Information Security Educators (FISSEA)
item.description: The organization, formerly known as the Federal Information Systems Security Educators Association (or FISSEA), serves as a professional forum for federal government information security professionals to assist agencies in strengthening their employee cybersecurity awareness and training programs. FISSEA also holds an annual conference.

item.title: Federal Evidence and Evaluation
item.description: For federal executive branch staff interested in evaluation and evidence-building. Connect with peers, share information, access resources and trainings, and sign up for events. Features content to support federal agencies as they implement the Evidence Act.

item.title: Federal Program and Project Management (FedPM)
item.description: The Federal Program and Project Management (FedPM) Community of Practice is the central source for the sharing of program and project management expertise across the entire federal government.

item.title: Mindful FED
item.description: A community that offers guided meditations, team trainings, and curated digital resources for federal employees to boost mindfulness, and cultivate wellbeing and resilience in the workplace.

item.title: TechAcq
item.description: IT acquisitions are at the heart of federal IT modernization efforts. They support agencies in delivering modern, digital services to the public more effectively and efficiently.

item.title: Join the Web Analytics
item.description: Make better decisions using web analytics and other optimization strategies.

item.title: Innovation Adoption
item.description: Our purpose is to build innovation and intrapreneurship capacity across government by investing in and nurturing innovation, intrapreneurship capabilities, and the innovation experience.

item.title: Join the Communicators
item.description: Improve written and verbal communication to make government more effective.

item.title: Federal Technology Investment Management
item.description: We share best practices and lessons learned to improve IT cost transparency across government.

item.title: Cloud and Infrastructure
item.description: A community for those who support their agencyâ€™s IT modernization efforts, and want to learn about application rationalization, data center optimization, and federal cloud computing.

item.title: Federal Leadership and Professional Development
item.description: Providing federal employees with seminars on leadership, professional development, and strategy.

item.title: Artificial Intelligence (AI)
item.description: Supporting and coordinating the use of artificial intelligence technologies in federal agencies.

item.title: Join the Social Media
item.description: Improve social media outreach and performance.

item.title: Robotic Process Automation (RPA)
item.description: A collaborative body designed to rapidly accelerate the adoption of Robotic Process Automation (RPA) technology across the federal government.

item.title: U.S. Web Design System
item.description: A community for anyone building federal websites with the U.S. Web Design System (USWDS) or considering it for a future project.

item.title: Section 508 IT Accessibility
item.description: To support people working to enhance access to federal information technology (IT), we identify and promote best practices for compliance with Section 508 law, and conformance to the Revised 508 Standards.

item.title: OpenGov
item.description: The Interagency Open Government Community of Practice is where we talk about transparency, open-participation, and collaboration across agencies.

item.title: Video Production Pros
item.description: Video Production Pros brings together passionate storytellers, artists, social media experts, strategists, and video production experts from across the U.S. government.

item.title: Join the Plain Language
item.description: Promote the use of plain language to provide better service to the public.

item.title: Crowdsourcing and Citizen Science
item.description: We work across government develop best practices for designing, implementing, and evaluating crowdsourcing and citizen science initiatives.

item.title: Customer Experience
item.description: We are an interagency group of customer experience practitioners.

item.title: Open Data
item.description: A community listserv and working group that unites 900 open data leads at federal agencies, data stewards, and all others in government interested in open data, enterprise data inventory, civic tech, and data-driven government issues.

item.title: Join the Multilingual
item.description: Expand and improve digital content in languages other than English.

item.title: Join the User Experience
item.description: Create better user-centered products for the public.

item.title: Challenge & Prize
item.description: We encourage public participation in crowdsourcing competitions to find innovative government solutions.

item.title: Join the Web Managers
item.description: Create a better online experience for the public alongside government web content managers.

item.title: Identity, Credential, and Access Management Subcommittee (ICAMSC)
item.description: The Identity, Credential, and Access Management Subcommittee (ICAMSC) is the principal interagency forum for identity management, secure access, authentication, authorization, credentials, privileges, and access lifecycle management.

item.title: IT Buyers
item.description: The Information Technology (IT) Buyers Community of Practice (ITB CoP) brings together acquisition programs, contract vehicle programs, and procurement specialists to create a community of federal IT buyers who share their experiences and scale their expertise across government.

item.title: DevOps
item.description: The practice of operations and development staff participating in the entire service lifecycle to operate rapidly changing resilient systems at scale.

item.title: Results-Oriented Accountability for Grants
item.description: Our community engages stakeholders around the Presidentâ€™s Management Agenda (PMA), and the Results-Oriented Accountability for Grants Cross-Agency Priority (CAP) Goal.

item.title: Application Programming Interfaces (APIs)
item.description: Working to advance the cause of APIs in the federal government.

item.title: Digital.gov Community Guidelines
item.description: GSA supports many communities of practice by hosting Listservs which provide our Digital.gov community with an easy way to collaborate, ask questions, and share information.
